name: Grolokk
description: Welcome ye lusty scoundrels seeking high adventure! Grolokk is a turn based RPG made in RPGMakerMV, following the adventures of a lowly Goblin Raider as he goes from a mere expendable piece of cannon-fodder to a full fledged Goblin Warlord! Collecting Gold, Glory, and attracting a stable of Nubile Human Harem Girls for him to indulge in!​
